thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com
thread.title: Kate Haderlie

author: Kate Haderlie
title: Kate Haderlie
text: The website is extremely user friendly - the templates were wonderfully useful, the process painless, and the resumes got emailed directly to me. The customer service team was extremely helpful and understanding. We were assigned a rep to help us sign on, and a separate rep to help us keep the account updated. They were all friendly and, even after our positions were filled, helped us close our account with professionalism.
